reviewText: I've been studying the JFK assassination since 1973. I am a poor reader and I learn better by watching documentaries. I am glad to add it to my collection.

WHEN LISTENING TO LBJ YOU GAIN GREAT INSIGHT INTO THE MIND AND MANNER OF  A MAN OF GREAT AND GROWING CONTROVERSY.

WITH THAT BEING SAID CURRENT THINKING AND PRESENT TIME REFLECTS A MAN VERY MUCH INVOLVED WITH STEERING THE INVESTIGAYION INTO THE KENNEDY ASSASSINATION INQUIRES AND CHARTING A NEW COURSE OF AMRICAN HISTORY.  THIS DVD ADDS A NEW PIECE TO THE JFK ASSASSINATION WHICH TOGETHER WITH OTHER PIECES CAN ONLY HIGHLIGHT THE WHO, THE WHAT AND WHY BEHIND A POINT IN HISTORY THAT STUNNED AND SADDENED THE NATION. A GREAT STUDY............
